Save up to $5 per ticket by using Ticket Central's movie passes     Discount movie passes allow you to see virtually any movie playing around the country at up to a $5 discount per ticket!     A discount movie pass is a voucher that is purchased at a discounted price and then exchanged at a participating movie theater for movie tickets. Discount movie passes are available for purchase in person at NYU Box Office (with valid NYU ID) with cash, credit card or campus cash.     Paying by NYU Departmental Transfer or Check?   Submit our department request form .                 Ticket Central Movie Pass Menu   AMC/Loews Theatres                                                    AMC/Loews Theatre Locations                                 Village 7 66 3rd Ave (at 11th St.), 212-505-6397   19th Street East 890 Broadway, 212-260-8000   34th St. Theatre 312 West 34th St., 212-244-8686   Kips Bay 570 2nd Ave, 212-447-9425   Empire 25 234 West 42nd St., 212-398-3939   Orpheum 1538 3rd Ave (at 86th St.), 212-505-6397   72nd St. East 1230 3rd Ave., 212-879-1313   Lincoln Square 1998 Broadway, 212-336-5000   84th St. Theatre 2310 Broadway, (212) 877-3600   Harlem 2309 Frederick Douglass Blvd., 212-665-8742                       Type   Price   Restrictions     Gold   $8.50   None. Can be used anytime for any movie.  No expiration date!      For more information, visit www.amcentertainment.com .          United Artists, Edwards, and Regal Cinemas                                                    United Artists/Edwards/Regal Cinemas Locations                                 Regal Battery Park Stadium 16 102 North End Avenue, (212) 945-4370   Regal Union Square 850 Broadway (at 14th), (212) 253-6266   E-Walk 42nd St. and 8th Ave, 212-505-6397   United Artists 64th and 2nd 1210 Second Ave, (212) 832-1671   UA East 85th Street 1629 1st Ave (Between 84th and 85th), (212) 249-5100   UA Court Street Stadium 12 108 Court Street, Brooklyn, (718) 246-8170                       Type Price Restrictions   Premiere Supersaver $8.50 None. Can be used anytime for any movie. $1.50 surcharge in Manhattan theatres.  No expiration date!      For more information, visit www.regmovies.com .          City Cinemas (including Angelika Film Center)                                                    City Cinemas Locations                                 Angelika Film Center, 18 W. Houston St. (at Mercer St.), (212) 995-2000   Beekman Theare, 254 2nd Ave, (212) 585-4141   City Cinemas Village East, 181-189 2nd Ave (2nd Ave at 12th St.), (212) 529-6998   City Cinemas Cinema I, II, Third Ave, 1001 3rd Ave. (at 60th St.), (212) 753-6022   City Cinemas 86th St. East, 210 E. 86th St. (Bet. 2nd and 3rd Aves), (212) 249-1144                       Type  Price  Restrictions    Golden  $8.00  Cannot be used within the first 2 weeks of a movie's release. No expiration date!      For more information, visit www.citycinemas.com .          Bow-Tie Cinemas (Formerly Clearview Cinemas)                                                    Bow-Tie Cinemas Locations                                 Chelsea Cinemas 260 West 23rd Street (at 8th Ave), (212) 777-FILM (3456)     Ziegfeld 141 West 54th Street, (212) 765-7600     Hoboken Cinemas 409-415 14th Street,     Hoboken, (201) 710-5581                       Type Price Restrictions   Bonus Ticket $7.50 None. $1 surcharge at Manhattan theatres.  No expiration date!      For more information, visit www.bowtiecinemas.com.          *Prices of movie passes sold at Ticket Central include a 6% - 9% surcharge which reflects the shipping and handling costs of obtaining these tickets from theatre vendors.          Discount movie passes are always on sale at Ticket Central! There is no limit on the amount of passes you may purchase, but the box office cannot guarantee immediate fullfillment of large orders (50+ passes).
